notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: C.M.-J., B.F.C. and J.P.S. designed the research; C.M.-J. carried out the analyses; C.M.-J. and N.M. analysed the data with contributions from A.M.P., B.F.C., W.K. and J.P.S.; C.M.-J. drafted the initial manuscript and wrote the paper along with N.M., A.M.P., B.F.C., W.K. and J.P.S.
